name: Check My UNO !
description:
Check My UNO ! is a small puzzle game where your goal is to get rid of the cards in your hand by playing them and capturing flags on a grid. Each card represents a piece from the Chess board game and it allows you to move according to the rules of Chess for that piece. Once you capture a flag, the card you used gets discarded.

The game contains 11 levels.

Can you solve them all ? ;)
